summary: The sprint planning meeting concluded with the client approving the execution of sprint SP-002, which includes user stories US-001 and US-002. The AI team has started generating code in the execution sandbox, with progress to be monitored via the dashboard.

decisions.title: Approve and initiate sprint SP-002
decisions.details: Sprint saved with US-001 and US-002; execution kicked off in sandbox

sign_offs.what: Approved start of execution for SP-002

actions.task: Generate code for Flask routes, Supabase integration, Tailwind UI, and Pytest tests in execution-sandbox

backlog_deltas.title: Sprint plan created successfully with US-001 and US-002
